Package filesystem

This package abstracts the file system on which the different commands operate; contains classes like Drive, File and Directory.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Directory This class implements the behavior of concrete directories.
Drive This class implements the access to the composition.
File This class implements the behavior of concrete files.
FileSystemItem This class abstracts File and Directory.
 

Package filesystem Description

This package abstracts the file system on which the different commands operate; contains classes like Drive, File and Directory.

Pattern: Composite

Allowed Collaborations:

  • May not know any other DOSBox Subsystems.
  • Is allowed to access any Java package.

These classes are instanciated to a network of objects like this:
